title: 5 Pack Athletic Gym Mens Shorts - Workout Black Quick Dry Basketball Shorts with Pockets for Running Casual Activewear
description: 【Soft & Comfortable & Cost Effective】Men's athletic shorts are made with soft fabric, upgraded in comfort, breathability and stretch, making you feel comfortable during your workout，5 packs offer a more favorable price than 1, 2, 3 and 4 pack.

【Fit & LightWeight】 Our men's gym shorts feature an elastic waistband with an inside drawstring. Whether you're running or training, our shorts stay comfortable and don't slide up or down, ensuring you get the perfect fit every time.

【LARGE POCKETS & STRONG SEAMS】 Two side pockets are designed to take the hassle out of backpacking for you, you can carry your smartphone, wallet or other essentials when you workout or go out. Upgraded shorts stitching and 10 inch inseam, so you can avoid the embarrassment of torn shorts.

【Quick Drying & Breathable】 Men's casual basketball shorts are made of moisture wicking fabric, which can absorb sweat from the skin and dry gently and quickly, so that you can stay comfortable and dry when exercising, home activities and sports.

【Multiple Occasions & Customer Service】BOOJO men's athletic shorts you can use as gym shorts, running shorts, basketball shorts or home leisure shorts, all of which can bring you a comfortable experience, if you have any questions about our products, please contact us！
